db:select.doc:name: select customer
db:select.db:parameterized-query: select email, first_name, last_name, loyalty_points from customer where id = #[xpath:/mes:getCustomer/mod:CustomerId]

db:update.doc:name: update customer loyalty points
db:update.db:parameterized-query: update customer set loyalty_points = loyalty_points + #[xpath:/mes:addLoyaltyPoints/mod:CustomerLoyaltyPoints] where id = #[xpath:/mes:addLoyaltyPoints/mod:CustomerId]

db:insert.doc:name: insert customer
db:insert.db:parameterized-query: insert into customer(id, first_name, last_name, email) values(#[customerId], #[xpath:/mes:saveCustomer/mod:Customer/firstName], #[xpath:/mes:saveCustomer/mod:Customer/lastName], #[customerId])

db:insert.doc:name: Bulk insert notification_preference
db:insert.db:parameterized-query: insert into notification_preference(customer_id, notification_type_id) values(#[customerId], (select notification_type_id from notification_type where notification_type_name = #[payload.preference]))

db:update.doc:name: update customer with salesforce_id
db:update.db:parameterized-query: update customer set salesforce_id = #[payload[0].RecordTypeId] where id = #[customerId]

db:insert.db:parameterized-query: insert into mobile_token(customer_id, mobile_token_type_id, token) values (#[xpath:/mes:addMobileToken/mod:CustomerId], #[xpath:/mes:addMobileToken/mod:MobileTokenType], #[xpath:/mes:addMobileToken/mod:MobileToken]) on duplicate key update token = #[xpath:/mes:addMobileToken/mod:MobileToken]
